animation.description: The animation effect of the skeleton placeholder
animation.description_zh: 骨架占位符的动画效果

size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name; Overrides 'height' and 'width' props and applies the value to both height and width
size.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位表示的大小，包括单位名称;覆盖 'height' 和 'width' 属性，并将值应用于 height 和 width

width.description: Width in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom width; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used
width.description_zh: 以 CSS 为单位的宽度，包括单位名称;应用自定义宽度;使用此道具或通过 CSS;如果使用，则被 'size' 道具覆盖

height.description: Height in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom height; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used
height.description_zh: 以 CSS 为单位的高度，包括单位名称;应用自定义高度;使用此道具或通过 CSS;如果使用，则被 'size' 道具覆盖
